accessibility.plateDropZone: Plate {{number}}. Press Enter to drop selected items here.
accessibility.draggableItem: Draggable {{itemName}} {{number}}. Press Enter to select for keyboard dropping.
accessibility.selectedItem: {{itemName}} {{number}} selected ({{count}}). Navigate to a plate and press Enter to drop. Press Enter again to deselect.
accessibility.plateDropZoneSingle: Plate {{number}}. Press Enter to drop selected item here.
accessibility.draggablePiece: Draggable {{itemName}} piece {{number}}. Press Enter to select for keyboard dropping.
accessibility.selectedPiece: {{itemName}} piece {{number}} selected. Navigate to a plate and press Enter to drop.
accessibility.dropZone: Drop zone for {{action}} mechanic, press Enter to drop selected plate

info.step1: Click on the items to select them.
info.step2: Drag the selected items and drop them on the plate.
info.feed_step1: Click on the item to feed the alien.
info.count_step1: Click on the number which is equal to the number of items on the table.
info.decompose_step1: Hi. I'm hungry. I want 13 moon cakes.
info.decompose_step3: Drag a tray here to give me more moon cakes.
info.decompose_step4: Click on the feed button to give me 13 moon cakes.
info.decompose_step5: 10 + 3 makes 13. Now I have just what I wanted.
info.compose_step1: Hi. I'm hungry for 11 moon sandwiches.
info.compose_step2: Drag two groups of trays that make 11 in all.
info.compose_step5: Click on the feed button to give me 11 moon sandwiches.
info.compose_step6: 10 + 1 makes 11. Now I have just what I wanted.
info.slice_step1: You need to give one half of the pizza to each alien.
info.slice_step2: Click the slicer up button to cut the pizza into two equal slices.
info.slice_step3: Now, drag and drop one slice to each alien's plate.
info.slice_step4: Click the check button to see if you got it right.
info.slice_step5: When you're ready, hit the play button to begin.

game.countTutorialQuestion: How many mooncakes does the alien have?
game.sliceTutorialQuestion: Give each alien one half of the pizza.
